summary: Defines a class that encapsulates the superoperator (matrix) representation of a quantum channel, supporting actions on vectorized density matrices and providing algebraic operations such as composition, tensoring, adjoint, transpose, and conjugation, as well as conversions to other channel forms.
business_intent: Enable quantum computing developers to model, manipulate, and simulate quantum channels within Qiskitâ€™s quantum information framework, facilitating analysis of noise and channel behavior in quantum algorithms.
